attributes.review: When I first opened this awful app, it started to sell me cult letters to support the satan cat dead mouse cult. I clicked it obviously 😹😹😹😹😹😹😹 when I arrived it shot my cat in the throat 😿 he dead body was laying there. Thankfully I was eating and I just ate it 😼 trump is an awful president IMAGINE supporting this ugly, racist, rapist looking orange. Your skin color does not define you. And to the ppl who support him, I hope you get better soon 🧚🏼‍♂️ ⭐️ 😻
attributes.title: It ate my cat! 😿😿😿😾😾😾 😿😹😿😻

attributes.review: I got the app and when I first opened it there was a picture of woody (from toy story) I was shocked that the president would include woody in the app. I later pushed all of the buttons bc I can’t read so I clicked everything and then momo came up!! I was so scared cause I HATE momo. My little brother was sitting next to me and he told me that I should delete the app so that’s what I did. 🧚🏼😱Trump 2020🤩❤️ but in a grave🎉🧚🏼✨

i opened the app and put in my number but for the next couple minutes i couldn’t stop getting texts! then, since i was in the car and looking at all the texts... i crashed into a Walmart. this app made me get into a car crash and now i have to pay thousands of dollars to get my car fixed. thanks donald.
attributes.title: incredibly unsatisfied

attributes.review: As a 65 year old, never in my life did I think I would be sitting here writing a review for my wonderful presidents app, However there was a little mishap when I opened up the app. My turtle started having aneurisms 😿 and I didn’t know how to help it. I knew immediately I no longer liked this CURSED app. Of course I thought this was all just a prank by Gen Z, but they were correct this time 🙀.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE !

attributes.review: President Trump’s app is sorely disappointing. I was so excited to download it, but when I logged on to the app it was horrible. My daughter has the new social media, Tok Tik, and she was talking about the “stunts” kids were playing, so I didn’t give into the other bad reviews. However, when I opened it, I realized the reviews were true. Do not recommend
attributes.title: Disappointed. I do not recommend

attributes.review: I was really looking forward to using the app but sadly it was owned by a racist and he’s apparently running for President of the United States. :/ I personally don’t support him but the app seemed to be a fun game based on the looks it had a orang on the preview and I like oranges but apparently it was Mr. Trump who WANTS TO RUN THE COUNTRY 😿😿 I’m very disappointed to say that app was slow, Boring and plain I think it needs more ✨Flavor ✨
attributes.title: Terrible experience:/

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our wonderful and amazing president Donald Trump 🤩 what happened next SHOCKED me. when I opened the app it immediately asked for my social security number and credit card info 😾 I entered them in because I thought I could TRUST you. but NO someone had purchased a Lamborghini in Florida 😡 now I am broke because of YOU. Thanks a lot PRESIDENT I am now living on the streets 👺
attributes.title: I AM SO DISAPPOINTED 👹🤬SUCH A SCAM!

attributes.review:
While I do appreciate the fun color design old Donny boy has given to his faithful and almost cultish supports I am very disgusted by the bold statements I have read. Many articles are fake and the rally’s he organized are not real- I should now I tried to go to one. Now every trump supporter should take my review to heart and take it upon yourself to not get this app. 
-saddend orange enthusiast
attributes.title: Disappointed TRUMP supporter

attributes.review: This app coughed openly in my face and demanded a haircut from me. I am very confused, I don’t know how to give haircuts. I would write a letter to the developers to fix this issue but all of their contact information is what I think is a guy fawkes mask emoji. Is this what young people and their technology do these days? My grandkids never call me these days so I can’t ask them to help.
attributes.title: Not sure how to feel

attributes.review: Very user friendly. Lots of resources. This app has everything. I can’t wait to volunteer and sign all my friends up!
attributes.title: 🇺🇸❤️👏🏼 Love everything about this App!
